summary: This document contains the Articles of Organization for PLAN ID, LLC, a limited liability company established in the US Virgin Islands. It outlines the company's name, purpose, and the details of its initial resident agent, Erika A. Kellerhals, who signed the document as the organizer.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika A. Kellerhals is identified as the organizer of PLAN ID, LLC, and she signed the Articles of Organization.

locations: 9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The document is the Articles of Organization for PLAN ID, LLC.
The company is organized under the Uniform Limited Liability Company Act in the US Virgin Islands.
Erika A. Kellerhals is the organizer and initial resident agent for the company.
The purpose of the company is to engage in any lawful activities permitted under Virgin Islands law.
The company is established with perpetual duration.
